summary: Project Manager with 10+ years of experience delivering digital platforms, product solutions, and data-driven business transformation across global teams. Proven at turning complex business needs into scalable systems through automation, analytics, and strong stakeholder alignment. After a short career break focused on upskilling and market readiness, I am motivated to return to a high-impact role where I can help teams build better products, improve execution, and drive real business results.
technicalSkills: AI & Automation: RAG, Prompt Engineering, Azure AI Foundry, Power Platform, n8n.
Analytics & Visualization: Power BI, Tableau, Looker Studio.
Cloud & Integration: Azure, Azure Functions, Cloud Run, GCP.
ERP Systems: Navision, SAP, Business Central.
Languages & Data: SQL, Python, Power Query.

experience.title: Project Manager
highlights: Led cross-functional digital transformation programs across global teams, delivering scalable platforms, faster processes, and multi-million DKK business impact.
Owned the end-to-end delivery of data and automation initiatives by translating business needs into technical solutions and driving adoption across stakeholders.
Defined and implemented data governance and data quality standards for the department, creating a reliable foundation for analytics and reporting.
Modernized legacy operations by migrating Excel-based workflows into centralized SQL and data-warehouse-ready environments, improving speed, accuracy, and system integration.
Built automation and workflow platforms using Power Apps, Power Automate, Python, and Azure DevOps, reducing turnaround time from days to minutes and increasing team efficiency by 40%.
Delivered executive-level Power BI dashboards that provided real-time visibility into financial, operational, and sustainability performance.
Acted as the data and reporting owner for corporate sustainability, supporting CO₂ and material usage reporting for CSR and regulatory needs.

experience.title: Strategy Consultant
highlights: Led a consulting project for a SaaS procurement and fraud-detection product, owning the strategic implementation and go-to-market planning for the Danish public sector.
Analysed product readiness, customer needs, regulatory context, and competitive landscape using structured strategy and market analysis frameworks.
Gathered and translated stakeholder inputs from internal teams, customers, and competitors into clear product, market, and launch requirements.
Defined product positioning, target segments, pricing approach, partnership model, and success metrics to support a scalable market rollout.
Project awarded the highest academic grade for quality, business value, and execution.

experience.title: Operation Manager
highlights: Led large cross-functional teams in high-risk and fast-changing environments, ensuring disciplined execution, clear priorities, and on-time delivery of critical missions.
Owned end-to-end operations, logistics, and financial planning for a 100+ member organization, including budget control, asset management, and compliance-based reporting.
Coordinated multiple internal units and external agencies to deliver complex, multi-stakeholder programs with strong alignment and risk control.
Led the technical validation and rollout of a large-scale defence system, managing vendor engagement, service agreements, and operational readiness.
Built strong performance and resilience through structured training, process standards, and continuous monitoring.
Recognized with a national gallantry award for leadership, execution excellence, and impact under pressure.

education.description: Bachelor in Engineering (Mechanical), University of Pune, India				    2009

awards.description: Recognized with a national gallantry award for leadership, execution excellence, and impact under pressure.
